meta.dc:subject: legislation
meta.dc:rights: The Government of the Hong Kong Special Administrative Region

docTitle.name: shortTitle
docTitle.content: Private Healthcare Facilities Ordinance (Specification of Period for Section 136(1)(b)) Notice

main.enactingFormula: (Made by the Director of Health under section 136(6)(b) of the Private Healthcare Facilities Ordinance (Cap. 633))

section.name: s1
section.heading: Commencement
section.content: This Notice comes into operation on the day on which section 136 of the Private Healthcare Facilities Ordinance (Cap. 633) comes into operation.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Specification of period for section 136(1)(b) of Ordinance
section.content: The period specified for the purposes of section 136(1)(b) of the Ordinance is the period beginning on 13 October 2025 and ending on 13 April 2026.
